If target attacked by Yayoi dies in 5 seconds it gives <color=#77c877>100%</color> more rewards. This effect does not overlap.
Yayoi steals <color=#c87777>15%</color> damage from nearby 1 tile of idols.
Yayoi's attack bounces once. Every bounce decreases damage by 50%.
Yayoi's attack bounces twice. Every bounce decreases damage by 50%.

Target gets knockback for <color=#77c877>$</color> seconds. Effect time increases 1 per $ vocal points. This skill can be used on Kuroi idols.

Skill can be toggled auto-activation. Auto-activation targets Kuroi first.
